articles.title: Dolly Parton is fully vaccinated with 'her own medicine' after donating $1M to help fund Moderna - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dolly Parton, 75, reveals she is fully vaccinated and jokes she got a 'second dose of her own medicine' after donating $1M to help fund the Moderna shot. She shared she felt compelled to donate
articles.content:
Dolly Parton is fully vaccinated after getting her second dose of the Moderna shot to combat COVID-19.
